input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: I am hungry.
output: Ham olishman.
expected: Men och qoldim.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: She is my sister.
output: O'zingim bo'lib.
expected: U mening singlim.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: The weather is cold today.
output: Bugun qimmat bo'ladi.
expected: Bugun havo sovuq.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: This is my house.
output: Булома у оўла.
expected: Bu mening uyim.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: We are friends.
output: Biz dostlar.
expected: Biz do‘stmiz.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: I want some water.
output: Meni suxni bo'ladi.
expected: Menga biroz suv kerak.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: He is very tall.
output: Ushbu o'zinglar juda kichik.
expected: U juda baland bo‘yli.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Where is the bus stop?
output: autobus yo'qishini nima?
expected: Avtobus bekati qayerda?

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: I like your car.
output: Tundir xavfiqni yaxshi.
expected: Menga mashinangiz yoqdi.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: My name is Ali.
output: Olimim nomi Ali.
expected: Mening ismim Ali.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: I go to the gym three times a week.
output: Wo manasininga 3 marta bir hafta.
expected: Men haftasiga uch marta sport zaliga boraman.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Yesterday we went shopping at the mall.
output: Yuxudagi biz men bo'lgan toshkent.
expected: Kecha biz savdo markaziga borib xarid qildik.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: He speaks Uzbek, Russian, and English fluently.
output: Uzsbek, rus tilida va ingliz tilida oʻzgarishi mumkin.
expected: U o‘zbek, rus va ingliz tillarida ravon gapiradi.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: I forgot my wallet at home this morning.
output: Bu so'nggi bilan shug'ur qilingan.
expected: Ertalab hamyonimni uyda unutib qoldim.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: My father works in a bank as a manager.
output: Baba bankda boshlig'i sifatida ishlaydi.
expected: Otam bankda menejer bo‘lib ishlaydi.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: We are planning to visit Samarkand next month.
output: O'zim Samarkandning o'tining yilga tashkil qilishni undiramiz.
expected: Keyingi oy Samarqandga borishni rejalashtiryapmiz.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: The train leaves at 8:30 in the morning.
output: 30-ga oʻtiningda qayta tashkil qiladi.
expected: Poyezd ertalab soat 8:30 da jo‘naydi.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Please call me when you arrive.
output: Siz yaxshi bo'lganida quyidagi bilan bog'liq bo'lishi kerak.
expected: Yetib borganingizda iltimos, menga qo‘ng‘iroq qiling.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: I don’t eat meat, but I like fish.
output: Men ma'lumot qilma, ammo qizil o'yma.
expected: Men go‘sht yemayman, lekin baliqni yaxshi ko‘raman.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: There is a big park near my house.
output: O'zgarish bo'lgan shaharda qishda bor.
expected: Uyim yonida katta bog‘ bor.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Education is the most powerful tool to change the world.
expected: Ta’lim — dunyoni o‘zgartirishning eng kuchli vositasidir.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: No matter how difficult the road is, we must keep moving forward.
output: Qanday qisqa yo'l bo'lsa ham, biz qanday qilamiz.
expected: Yo‘l qanchalik qiyin bo‘lmasin, biz oldinga yurishda davom etishimiz kerak.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: He achieved success thanks to his patience and hard work.
output: O'zgarishni qabul qilish va yaxshi ishlash uchun sabr bilan o'rnatilgan.
expected: U sabr-toqat va mehnati tufayli muvaffaqiyatga erishdi.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Freedom of speech is an important right in every society.
output: Joklanma muammolarning muhim rivojlanishidir.
expected: So‘z erkinligi har bir jamiyatda muhim huquqdir.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: The book discusses the impact of technology on human relationships.
output: Kitob technologiya haman oʻzaro muvaffaqiyatini oʻrganaydi.
expected: Kitob texnologiyaning inson munosabatlariga ta’sirini muhokama qiladi.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: People should take responsibility for protecting the environment.
output: Shaxslar ma'lumotlarni ta'minlash uchun ta'minlash uchun xarakterli.
expected: Odamlar atrof-muhitni asrash uchun mas’uliyatni o‘z zimmasiga olishi kerak.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: True friendship is based on trust and honesty.
output: Xalq do'stligi o'zgargan yoki qiziqarli bo'ladi.
expected: Haqiqiy do‘stlik ishonch va halollikka asoslanadi.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Our history is full of lessons for future generations.
output: Bizning tarixi bir-birimiz bilan birlashgan, keyingi yilliklar uchun o'ziga xosliklarga ega.
expected: Tariximiz kelajak avlodlar uchun saboqlarga boy.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: In difficult times, unity is the key to overcoming challenges.
output: Oʻtgan vaqtda, birlik katta qanday qonuniy qoidalarni qanday qilishi mumkin.
expected: Qiyin paytlarda birlik sinovlarni yengishning kalitidir.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Success without ethics is an empty achievement.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Man, he talks big but never does anything.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: Let’s grab some burgers after work.
output: Bizga, ishdan keyin burgerlarni qabul qilaman.

input: Provide only the translated text from en to uz: I’m broke, can you cover me this time?
